TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ScrollPattern extends System.Windows.Automation.BasePattern

summary.span: Represents controls that act as scrollable containers for a collection of child elements.

span.span: Represents controls that act as scrollable containers for a collection of child elements.

summary.span: The children of this element support .

span.span: The children of this element support .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Consulte [mapeamento de padrão de controle para clientes de automação de interface do usuário](~/docs/framework/ui-automation/control-pattern-mapping-for-ui-automation-clients.md) para obter exemplos de controles que podem implementar esse padrão de controle.See [Control Pattern Mapping for UI Automation Clients](~/docs/framework/ui-automation/control-pattern-mapping-for-ui-automation-clients.md) for examples of controls that may implement this control pattern.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Valores de propriedade em cache devem ser anteriormente solicitados usando um .Cached property values must have been previously requested using a . Use para obter o valor atual de uma propriedade.Use to get the current value of a property. Para obter informações sobre as propriedades disponíveis e seu uso, consulte .For information on the properties available and their use, see .

exception.span: The requested property is not in the cache.

span.span: The requested property is not in the cache.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Current As ScrollPattern.ScrollPatternInformation

summary.span: Gets the current [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this .

span.span: Gets the current [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this .

value.span: Uma estrutura que contém atual [! Valores de propriedade Include[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/Includes/tla2sharptla-UIAutomation-MD.MD)] para o padrão de controle.

span.span: A structure containing the current [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for the control pattern.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Esse padrão deve ser de um com um referência para obter os valores atuais.This pattern must be from an with an reference in order to get current values. Se o foi obtida usando , ele contém somente dados armazenados em cache e tentar obter o valor atual de qualquer propriedade gera uma exceção.If the was obtained using , it contains only cached data, and attempting to get the current value of any property raises an exception. Use para obter o valor armazenado em cache de uma propriedade que tenha sido especificado usando um .Use to get the cached value of a property that was previously specified using a . Para obter informações sobre as propriedades disponíveis e seu uso, consulte .For information on the properties available and their use, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly HorizontallyScrollableProperty As AutomationProperty

span.span: Identifies the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Esse identificador é usado por aplicativos clientes de automação de interface do usuário.This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. Provedores de automação de interface do usuário devem usar o campo equivalente em .UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . ## Examples No exemplo a seguir, um elemento raiz é passado para uma função que retorna uma coleção de [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elementos que são descendentes da raiz e atendem a um conjunto de condições de propriedade.In the following example, a root element is passed to a function that returns a collection of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elements that are descendants of the root and satisfy a set of property conditions. [!code-csharp[UIAScrollPattern_snip#100](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.cs#100)] [!code-vb[UIAScrollPattern_snip#100](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.vb#100)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly HorizontalScrollPercentProperty As AutomationProperty

span.span: Identifies the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Esse identificador é usado por aplicativos clientes de automação de interface do usuário.This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. Provedores de automação de interface do usuário devem usar o campo equivalente em .UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . ## Examples No exemplo a seguir, um elemento raiz é passado para uma função que retorna os percentuais de rolagem horizontal e vertical atual da região visível na área de conteúdo.In the following example, a root element is passed to a function that returns the current horizontal and vertical scroll percentages of the viewable region within the content area. [!code-csharp[UIAScrollPattern_snip#104](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.cs#104)] [!code-vb[UIAScrollPattern_snip#104](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.vb#104)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly HorizontalViewSizeProperty As AutomationProperty

span.span: Identifies the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Esse identificador é usado por aplicativos clientes de automação de interface do usuário.This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. Provedores de automação de interface do usuário devem usar o campo equivalente em .UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . ## Examples No exemplo a seguir, um elemento raiz é passado para uma função que retorna os tamanhos atuais horizontais e verticais da região de dados podem ser exibido como porcentagens de área de conteúdo do total.In the following example, a root element is passed to a function that returns the current vertical and horizontal sizes of the viewable region as percentages of the total content area. [!code-csharp[UIAScrollPattern_snip#105](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.cs#105)] [!code-vb[UIAScrollPattern_snip#105](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.vb#105)]

summary.span: Specifies that scrolling should not be performed.

span.span: Specifies that scrolling should not be performed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Esse identificador é usado por aplicativos clientes de automação de interface do usuário.This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. Provedores de automação de interface do usuário devem usar o campo equivalente em .UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . O valor -1 pode ser substituído para o campo.The value -1 can be substituted for the field. ## Examples No exemplo a seguir, uma padrão de controle é obtido de um e, em seguida, é usado para rolar a região podem ser exibida na parte superior da área de conteúdo.In the following example, a control pattern is obtained from an and is then used to scroll the viewable region to the top of the content area. [!code-csharp[UIAScrollPattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.cs#103)] [!code-vb[UIAScrollPattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.vb#103)]

span.span: Identifies the control pattern.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Esse identificador é usado por aplicativos clientes de automação de interface do usuário.This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. Provedores de automação de interface do usuário devem usar o campo equivalente em .UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . O identificador padrão é passado para métodos como para recuperar o padrão de controle de interesse especificado .The pattern identifier is passed to methods such as to retrieve the control pattern of interest from the specified . ## Examples No exemplo a seguir, uma padrão de controle é obtido de um .In the following example, a control pattern is obtained from an . MemberSignature.Value: public void SetScrollPercent (double horizontalPercent, double verticalPercent);
.method public hidebysig instance void SetScrollPercent(float64 horizontalPercent, float64 verticalPercent) cil managed
Public Sub SetScrollPercent (horizontalPercent As Double, verticalPercent As Double)
public: void SetScrollPercent(double horizontalPercent, double verticalPercent);

param.name: horizontalPercent
param.span: The percentage of the total horizontal content area.

span.span: The percentage of the total horizontal content area.

param.span: should be passed in if the control cannot be scrolled in this direction.

span.span: should be passed in if the control cannot be scrolled in this direction.

param.name: verticalPercent
param.span: The percentage of the total vertical content area.

span.span: The percentage of the total vertical content area.

param.span: should be passed in if the control cannot be scrolled in this direction.

span.span: should be passed in if the control cannot be scrolled in this direction.

summary.span: Sets the horizontal and/or vertical scroll position as a percentage of the total content area within the .

span.span: Sets the horizontal and/or vertical scroll position as a percentage of the total content area within the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Esse método só é útil quando a área de conteúdo do controle é maior do que a região visível.This method is only useful when the content area of the control is larger than the visible region. Passando o valor indica que não há nenhuma rolagem na direção especificada.Passing in the value indicates that there is no scrolling in the specified direction. ## Examples No exemplo a seguir, uma padrão de controle é obtido de um e, em seguida, é usado para rolar a região visível para a posição de 'base' esquerda superior da área de conteúdo.In the following example, a control pattern is obtained from an and is then used to scroll the viewable region to the top left 'home' position of the content area. [!code-csharp[UIAScrollPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIAScrollPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.vb#101)] [!code-csharp[UIAScrollPattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.cs#102)] [!code-vb[UIAScrollPattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAScrollPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAScrollPattern_snippets.vb#102)]

exception.span: A value that cannot be converted to a double is passed in.

span.span: A value that cannot be converted to a double is passed in.

exception.span: A value greater than 100 or less than 0 is passed in (except -1, which is equivalent to ).

span.span: A value greater than 100 or less than 0 is passed in (except -1, which is equivalent to ).

exception.span: The and values are normalized to either 0% or 100%.

span.span: The and values are normalized to either 0% or 100%.
